mnemonic: A muscular arm flexing - showing raw POWER and strength! The curve is the bicep bulging.
A simple square opening - it's literally a MOUTH! Open wide and say "ahh".
A carpenter's square or ruler - the tool of CRAFT and construction work.
The sun setting behind a hill - EVENING time when the day ends.
Fingers reaching out - a HAND ready to grab or wave hello!
Pattern with marks - SENTENCE with written patterns.
A DOG with a tail wagging - the dot is the head, the strokes are the body and tail!
Samurai (士) with legs - SELLING goods while standing.
One (一) stop (止) - the CORRECT way is to stop at the line, perfectly aligned.
A RICE FIELD divided into four sections - traditional Japanese farming plots.
An eye turned sideways - you can see the pupil in the middle! Your EYE looking at you.
A person STANDING UP straight - legs planted firmly on the ground.
Two (二) legs - the BEGINNING of a person, starting from the ground up.
Eight (八) private (ム) - when eight people share, it becomes PUBLIC!
Seven (七) with a sword (刀) - CUT the seven into pieces with one slash!
Small (小) with a slash - even FEWER than small, just a tiny bit!
A HEART with three chambers pumping - the center of your emotions and feelings.
A flag pointing in a DIRECTION - follow the flag to know which way to go!
A COW's head with horns - the top stroke is the horns, bottom is the face.
A foot coming to a STOP - the toes hit the line and halt!
Mouth (口) with legs - ELDER BROTHER standing tall and speaking with authority.
Ice (冫) with walking - WINTER when you walk on ice.
Ten (十) with mouth (口) - OLD stories passed down through ten mouths.
A platform shape - PEDESTAL or stand to place things on.
Building with wide space - WIDE and spacious interior.
A fence with opening - UTILIZE by opening the gate for use.
Three tens (十) stacked - representing the WORLD across three generations.
A candle flame on a stand - the MAIN light source, the master of the room.
A person (イ) with a weapon (弋) - representing a GENERATION of warriors.
A roof with legs - COPYING the shape exactly, like a photograph.
Earth (土) with private (ム) - LEAVE the earth behind, go away.
Roof with child (子) - LETTER or character learned at home.
Sun (日) rising early - EARLY morning when the sun just appears.
Rice field (田) with nail (丁) - TOWN built on rice fields.
Grass (艹) with change (化) - FLOWER that changes and blooms.
Earth (土) with fire (火) - RED like burning earth.
Leg with foot - FOOT for walking.
A bird unable to fly - NEGATIVE, not able to do something.
Person (イ) serving (士) - SERVING others, doing work for someone.
A roof over people meeting - a MEETING or gathering under one roof.
One (一) opening (口) together - SAME, all in one group.
Two evenings (夕夕) - MANY nights passing.
Old (老) with bend - THINK like an old person pondering.
Flesh inside - MEAT, the flesh we eat.
A nose - SELF, pointing to your own nose.
Person (色) with knife - COLOR, the appearance of things.
Person (イ) with foundation (本) - the BODY is the foundation of a person.
Person (イ) doing work (乍) - MAKING things with your hands.
Enclosure with measurement - MAP showing the layout.
Bow with string - YOUNGER BROTHER who practices archery.
Altar (示) with earth (土) - COMPANY or shrine on sacred ground.
Mouth speaking - SAY or words.
Person running - RUN quickly.
Movement (辶) with axe (斤) - NEAR, close by.
Hole (穴) with craft (工) - EMPTY space like a crafted hole.
Life (生) with moon (月) - BLUE like the moon in the living sky.
Stand (立) with sun (日) - SOUND standing in the daylight.
Earth (土) with also (也) - GROUND, the earth beneath.
Woman (女) under roof - CHEAP and peaceful when women are safe at home.
Hand holding meat (月) - EXIST, to have something in hand.
Bones (歹) with spoon (匕) - DEATH when you can't eat anymore.
A tall capital building - CAPITAL city with grand structures.
Person (亻) with evening (夕) - NIGHT when people rest in the evening.
Woman (女) with not yet (未) - YOUNGER SISTER, not yet grown.
Woman (女) with market (市) - ELDER SISTER who shops at the market.
Building with fortune (占) - STORE where you buy goods.
Sun (日) and moon (月) - BRIGHT when both lights shine.
Stop (止) with few (少) - WALK by taking small stops.
A framed picture - BRUSH-STROKE or painting.
Arrow (矢) with mouth (口) - KNOW by speaking straight like an arrow.
Roof with reaching (至) - ROOM where you arrive and stay.
Field (田) with heart (心) - THINK with your heart and mind.
Water (氵) with every (毎) - SEA with water everywhere.
Grass (艹) with roof and tree - TEA leaves from plants.
A person (イ) using (以) a tool - everything done BY means of tools.
A person standing in heat - SUMMER when it's hot.
Roof with pig (豕) - HOUSE where even pigs live under the roof.
Thread (糸) with family (氏) - PAPER made from plant fibers.
Movement (辶) with pass through (甬) - PASS THROUGH.
Bow with insect (虫) - STRONG like a bow that can shoot through insects.
Filial (孝) with strike (攵) - TEACH by disciplining children.
Jewel (玉) with village (里) - LOGIC, the precious truth of the village.
Movement (辶) with circumference (周) - WEEK, a cycle of days.
A fish shape with scales - FISH swimming.
A bird shape - BIRD flying.
Fire (火) with earth (土) - BLACK like burned earth.
Person (イ) with master (主) - DWELLING where the master lives.
Arrow in a box - MEDICINE and healing, like arrows in a doctor's kit.
Hole (穴) with nine (九) - RESEARCH by digging nine holes.
Old person speaking - PERSON of importance.
Stone (石) with open (開) - STUDY by grinding stone to open knowledge.
Earth (土) with sun (日) and easy (易) - a PLACE where the sun shines easily.
Moon (月) with ten (十) and sun (日) - MORNING when moon fades and sun rises.
Bamboo (竹) with together (合) - SOLUTION found by putting ideas together.
Net (罒) with shell (貝) - BUY goods with money in your net.
Movement (辶) with neck (首) - ROAD, the path ahead.
Tree (木) with white (白) - MUSIC and pleasure, easy like white wood.
A hand holding something - MATTER or thing to handle.
Person (イ) with official (史) - an official USE or messenger.
Woman (女) with platform (台) - COMMENCE when the woman takes the stage.
Boat (舟) with strike (攵) - CLOTHING worn on a boat journey.
Cow (牛) with do not (勿) - THING, even cows are things.
Corpse with reaching (至) - SHOP or building where you arrive.
Building with measure (又) - DEGREES of measurement.
Person going (彳) with temple (寺) - WAIT at the temple for someone.
Hand (扌) with temple (寺) - HOLD onto the temple pillar.
Rice field (田) with boundary (介) - WORLD divided into fields.
Two legs departing - DEPART or emit, leaving from here.
Movement (辶) with關 - SEND off on a journey.
Thousand (千) with inside (里) - HEAVY with weight.
Run (走) with self (己) - GET UP and start running.
Hill (阝) with complete (完) - INSTITUTION on the hill.
Thread (糸) with winter (冬) - END when the thread runs out.
Feather (羽) with white (白) - LEARN like a bird learning to fly.
Car (車) with revolve (云) - TURN or rotate.
Movement (辶) with army (軍) - CARRY like an army transport.
Gate (門) with two hands (廾) - OPEN the gate.
Tree (木) with bird (隹) - GATHER like birds in a tree.
Food (食) with lack (欠) - DRINK when lacking food.
Tree (木) with many marks - BUSINESS like a tree with many branches.
Water (氵) with man (漢) - CHINESE, the Han people by the river.
Lack (欠) with can (可) - SONG sung when you can open your mouth.
Stand (立) with tree (木) and see (見) - PARENT standing by the tree watching.
Sickness (疒) with inside (丙) - SICK with illness inside.
Bone (骨) with sword (刀) - SEPARATE the bones by cutting them apart.
Water (氵) with master (主) - POUR water from the master vessel.
Water (氵) with sheep (羊) - OCEAN where water is vast as sheep herds.
Cow (牛) with temple (寺) - SPECIAL cow kept at the temple.
Sound (音) with heart (心) - MEANING comes from the sound in your heart.
Mouth (口) with not yet (未) - TASTE something you haven't tried before.
Exempt (免) with power (力) - EXERTION, using power without excuse.
Direction (方) with people - TRIP with people traveling together.
Mouth (口) with shell (貝) - MEMBER who contributes like valuable shells.
Heavy (重) with power (力) - MOVE with heavy force.
Asia (亜) with heart (心) - EVIL heart from the dark side of Asia.
Direction (方) with arrow (矢) - TRIBE shooting arrows in one direction.
Sheep (羊) with eye (目) - ARRIVE and WEAR, sheep in sight.
Village (里) with beforehand (予) - FIELD in the countryside.
Insect (虫) with sail - WIND that moves insects and sails.
Stand (立) with tree (木) and axe (斤) - NEW wood from cutting trees.
Gate (門) with mouth (口) - QUESTION asked at the entrance.
Metal (金) with root (艮) - SILVER, precious metal.
Head (頁) with right (是) - TOPIC, the main heading.
Food (食) with official (官) - BUILDING, public hall.
Horse (馬) with shakuhachi (尺) - STATION where horses stop.
Rice (米) with measure (斗) - MATERIALS measured like rice.
Sun (日) with center (央) - REFLECT the sun from the center.
Grain (禾) with private (厶) - PRIVATE grain, my own.
Broom sweeping home - RETURN home to clean up.
Three (三) people (人) under sun (日) - SPRING when people gather in sunshine.
Daytime sun (日) with measure (尺) - NOON when you measure the sun's height.
Grain (禾) with fire (火) - AUTUMN harvest season.
Words (言) with ten (十) - MEASURE and count.
Movement (辶) with brush (聿) - BUILD by moving and creating.
Grass (艹) with center (央) - ENGLAND, the central flower.
Food (食) with oppose (反) - RICE, cooked meal.
Sun (日) with wings (羽) - DAY OF WEEK when the sun flies across the sky.
Three mouths (口口口) - many GOODS and products for sale.
Heart (心) with reaching (及) - HURRY when your heart races to reach something.
Ten (十) with eye (目) - TRUE when seen clearly.
Earth (土) with tall building - a grand HALL or temple building.
Words (言) with style (式) - TEST with formal words.
Person (イ) with past (昔) - BORROWING from what came before.
Horse (馬) with test (験) - TEST or examine.
Two shells (貝貝) with axe (斤) - QUALITY measured in shells.
Shell (貝) with substitute (代) - LEND money as a substitute.
